climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere
csw:Record.dct:abstract: This dataset provides climatologies for ozone and carbon monoxyde over a decade (2001-2010). Two types of climatologies are available: with 10 fixed pressure levels (from 288 hPa to 186 hPa) or with 4 dynamic pressure levels (lower stratosphere, upper statisphere, tropopause, upper troposphere).
csw:Record.dc:description: This dataset provides climatologies for ozone and carbon monoxyde over a decade (2001-2010). Two types of climatologies are available: with 10 fixed pressure levels (from 288 hPa to 186 hPa) or with 4 dynamic pressure levels (lower stratosphere, upper statisphere, tropopause, upper troposphere).
csw:Record.dc:source: Data produced by the European Research Infrastructure IAGOS.
